amendment.description: To increase, with an offset, amounts available for the procurement of Predator unmanned aerial vehicles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1548 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1548 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To increase, with an offset, amounts available for the procurement of Predator unmanned aerial vehicles.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1548 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1548 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Conrad.
